thread.title: Matt Damon cried when George Clooney told him Amal is having twins Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Matt Damon cried when George Clooney told him Amal is having twins Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7

author: Leah Cohen
title: Matt Damon cried when George Clooney told him Amal is having twins Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7
text:
Share Matt Damon cried when George Clooney told him Amal is having twins Yahoo7 Be - Yahoo7 
Matt Damon has revealed the super cute way his close friend George Clooney told him his wife Amal was expecting twins. George and Amal Clooney expecting twins UP NEXT VIDEO Hollywood couple George and Amal Clooney are expecting twins according a close friend. It was revealed they are expecting a boy and a girl due in June. Source: 7 News George and Amal Clooney expecting twins 
The Ocean’s Eleven co-stars were working together on the upcoming film Suburbicon when the 55-year-old father-to-be spilled the exciting baby news. Matt "almost started crying” when he found out about George and Amal's twin news. Photo: Getty Images 
“I was working with him last fall and he pulled me aside on set and I mean, I almost started crying,” Matt told Entertainment Tonight Canada. 
“I was so happy for him. And I was like, ‘how far along is she?’ And he goes, ‘eight weeks,’ [I said], ‘Are you out of your mind?! Don't tell anybody else! Don't tell anybody else! Don't you know the 12-week rule?’ Like of course he doesn't. ‘Just shut up, man.’” Matt recalled telling George. George and Amal are expecting twins. Photo: Getty Images 
“And then four weeks later, I'm like, ‘we're good right?’” Matt continued. George replied, “We're good.” 
George and Amal will become first-time parents in June to a boy and a girl. 
Matt told ET he’s “thrilled” for his longtime mate and his “amazing” wife. "I'm thrilled for him. She's amazing. He hit the jackpot." Photo: Getty Images 
“He hit the jackpot. Just on every level. She is a remarkable woman. They're gonna be great. They're gonna be awesome parents. Those kids are lucky,” he said. 
Host Julie Chen of US chat show The Talk , confirmed the happy news on air, saying the handsome actor and the British-Lebanese beauty, who wed in 2014, are expecting twins. 
"Congratulations are in order for George and Amal Clooney," she said. 
"Now, what we did find out that no one else is reporting, is that the twins are due this June." Amal is due in June with a boy and a girl. Photo: Getty Images 
According to InTouch Magazine , an insider said the Money Monster star and the human rights attorney were “surprised” but “happy” when he found out. 
“When George and Amal found out it was twins they were surprised but also a little scared because they both had said that one was enough,” the source said. 
“But the news that it was a boy and a girl made them both really happy... They can't believe in just a few months, they're going to have two babies.” The couple married in 2014. Photo: Getty Images. 
The Gravity actor reportedly wants to call his son Nicholas, after his father, however is leaving Amal to think of names for their daughter! 
Amal fueled speculation earlier this year that she was pregnant with twins when she stepped out at a Netflix event with her hubby sporting a rounder stomach than usual. 
RELATED: This is why Matt Damon is taking a break from acting 
Known for wearing skin-tight dresses that show off her stunning physique, the lawyer showed up wearing a very loose, flowery dress that appeared to be hiding a baby bump. 
There seems to be a baby boom in Hollywood right now, with George and Amal’s boy and girl twin news coming days after Beyonce and Jay Z announced they’re also expecting twins. George Clooney Trolls Haters on Second Wedding Anniversary UP NEXT
